post/2004/New REBOL Pages

date

2004-12-26
tags

note/2004

I hope everybody is enjoying the holiday season. It has been pretty nice around here - no white Christmas, or anything like that, but we did make the best turkey I have every tasted in my life. Oh, and the pie … mmmm…

Other than that, I’ve been doing a lot of exploring on the Rebol front. The result so far? A page summarizing post/2004/REBOL Datatypes , as well as post/2004/REBOL Babysteps to introduce the language. As always, I would be grateful for any pointers or suggestions to improve on it.
